alert.note: Alert for Allamakee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 3:00PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Iowa...Minnesota... Mississippi River at Lansing affecting Crawford, Vernon, Houston and Allamakee Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Lansing. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.8 feet, Water begins to cover Highway X52 by the wastewater treatment plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning and continue rising to 19.2 feet early Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued tonight by 1100 PM CDT.
